questions.question: Generally single phase loads having transformers have the following type of fuse as main protection.
Better reliability can be observed in distribution system with

answers.c: Same in both type of network

answers.b: Break but cannot close on load
answers.c: Close on but cannot break load
answers.d: Neither can break or close on load

questions.question: The final operation of the recloser for a close in permanent fault is

Consider 5P20 class CT ratio:1000/1, Normal rated current of 900 A. Consider a overloading of 10 % while calculating plug setting of the relay with IEC SI curve. Let the initial set TMS be 0.1. Relay settings has ranges for PSM of 50% to 200% in steps of 25% and TMS setting range of 0.1 to 1.1 in step of 0.05. The operating time for a three phase fault of 15 kA is (Hint: Calculate PS, then calculate the operating time using the curve characteristics equation)
